==== About ====

Greetings, I’m Md. I’m a consultant living in Dhaka, Bangladesh. I am a fan of Hi-Tech, entrepreneurship, and programming.

I’m also interested in Linux,DevOps, Linux Security, Cisco, Networking and innovation. If you have any project related with any linux ping me
